ThingDef.label: VATS Implant
ThingDef.description: A variation of the VaultTec Assisted Targeting System that is implanted directly into the user's brain.

ThingDef.label: xen bionic leg
ThingDef.description: Impressing technology allows the user to move around faster than ever.

ThingDef.label: xen's elvis pelvis
ThingDef.description: Impressing technology allows the user to do pelvic thrusts which mysteriously enhance all their abilities. UH HUH! PRETTY MOMMAH!
